EmailTemplate.name: Tennessee Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: vAuto Provisioning Workshop - Franklin, TN - April 14
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
vAuto Provisioning Workshop Franklin, TN Tuesday, April 14, 2015
Thank you for registering for the workshop! Your registration is confirmed.
We will see you on Tuesday, April 14, 2015 at:
Location: Franklin Marriott Cool Springs 700 Cool Springs Boulevard Franklin, TN 37067 615-261-6100
Agenda Overview: 8:30am - Check-in and Continental Breakfast (provided by vAuto) 9:00am - Meeting Start 12:00pm - Meeting End
Note: To reserve a hotel room at the Franklin Marriott Cool Springs, you may book online here <http://www.marriott.com/hotels/travel/bnacs-franklin-marriott-cool-springs/> or call the hotel directly at 410-859-8300. Don't forget to bring your laptop or other device to access the vAuto Provision tool during the workshop!
